text: @ewarren @AOC “The single largest line item in the stimulus is the nearly $500-billion slush fund for corporations,” This money has some guardrails attached but these can be waived if Secretary Mnuchin simply chooses to.”  DISGUSTING AND CORRUPT AT OUR EXPENSE.https://t.co/ln4extaO0P
